data.name: Bonus_News_Paragraph_1
data.value: "Beard News" is a monthly podcast in which I talk about tech gossip, events in my life, new and old content, and upcoming plans.

data.name: Bonus_News_Paragraph_2

data.name: Interview_Paragraph_1
data.value: The main format of the show is interviews with active people from the Tech & Science. They are the real Rock Stars who move industry forward!
